venue.address_1: 175 STATE ROAD EAST (RT 2A) ACROSS FROM WACHUSETT BREWERY
venue.name: WHITMAN RIVER TRAIL

item.description:
Please there is no need to respond "NO" if you can't attend---Please Be there and ready to go at 4pm

This is a gorgeous trail which runs along the Whitman River in Westminster. The trail runs through beautiful forest and wetlands, it crosses 2 smaller streams and passes by small seeps, ponds and vernal pools.  It supports a variety of wild life such as beaver, deer, moose, ducks and many birds.  The elevation rises about 150 feet over the mile walk upstream.  Glacial deposits have created some small hills along the trail.  The entire walk is about 3 miles depending on the path we choose.  It is peaceful and picturesque.  I would recommend a camera as well as bug spray for the ticks.  The hike can be done in 2.5 hours....or more with a leisurely pace.  There are plenty of places to stop and enjoy the scenery!

Bring a light sandwich, appetizer and/or beverage if you wish to take a break at the picnic area next to the pond.

Parking is located at the soccer field across the street from the Wachusett Brewery at 175 State Road East (Rt 2A), Westminster, MA  01475.  When entering the dirt parking lot, please park on the far right side.  The trail begins there.  Please be aware that the scoccer players/parents usually park along the side facing the field.
item.how_to_find_us: Far right side of the dirt parking lot across from Wachusett Brewery

group.name: Northern Central MA, Southern NH Hiking Group

item.name: Whitman River Trail and Picnic at Crocker Pond.....
